summary: A comprehensive pytest-based test suite for the LiteLLM library and proxy, covering caching mechanisms, routing strategies, provider integrations, authentication, budgeting, logging, monitoring, and utility functions across synchronous and asynchronous LLM operations.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, reliability, and compliance of the LiteLLM platform to ensure stable LLM service delivery, accurate cost tracking, secure authentication, and seamless integration with external logging and monitoring tools.
